description:
The project will produce products and serves that strengthen the capacity of institutions to respond to HIV and AIDS.  The key areas of focus are:
-  Institutional capacity strengthening integrading HIV and AIDS into development processess.

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened national capacity for inclusive governance and coordination of national HIV responses, and for the protection of human rights of people affected by HIV, including women and other vulnerable groups
subproject.description: Strengthened structures, systems, staff, policies and plans for coordinated health, nutrition and HIV/AIDS services delivery
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Strengthened structures, syste

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened national capacity for inclusive governance and coordination of national HIV responses, and for the protection of human rights of people affected by HIV, including women and other vulnerable groups
subproject.description: The output for 2012 entails; developing the strategies that were previously commenced completed; the completed strategies disseminated and rolled out (the incomplete strategies include Civil Society Capacity Building Strategy and Community Mobilization Strategy) and mechanisms to enhance Public Private Partnerships on HIV and AIDS services established.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Civil society mobilisation on

title: Governance of HIV and AIDS
